references.paper_title: PointNet: Deep learning on point sets for 3d classification and segmentation
references.reason: This paper is foundational for many subsequent works on 3D point cloud analysis, introducing the PointNet architecture.

references.paper_title: Pointnet++: Deep hierarchical feature learning on point sets in a metric space
references.reason: This work extends PointNet to handle larger-scale point clouds by introducing hierarchical feature learning.

references.paper_title: Ulip: Learning unified representation of language, image and point cloud for 3d understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces the ULIP model, a multi-modal foundation model that is leveraged by the current work.

references.paper_title: Ulip-2: Towards scalable multimodal pre-training for 3d understanding
references.reason: This is a newer, improved version of ULIP, also used as a foundation model in this work.

references.paper_title: Pointclip: Point cloud understanding by clip
references.reason: This work adapts CLIP to point cloud understanding, a significant step that this paper builds upon.
